author: Nick Romano
title: John Oliver slams Fox News, Dr. Phil for coronavirus misinformation
description: Oliver dug into "the right-wing media sphere" behind the spread of misinformation about the coronavirus.
content: John Oliver's corona-watch continues on Last Week Tonight, this time with a look at all the misinformation surrounding COVID-19. It feels like a necessary subject. Just this Sunday, Reuters photographer Alyson McClaran captured images of medical professionals… [+3348 chars]
